welcome_cta_subtitle: Log in with your Google account to link your calendar and create your first shareable link.

privacy_intro: This privacy policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you use our application.
privacy_p_data_collected: When you authenticate with your Google account, we receive and store the following information:
privacy_li_user_info: User Information: Your email address, as provided by Google.
privacy_li_calendar_data: Google Calendar Data: We request read and write access to your Google Calendar to find available time slots and schedule new appointments. We only read the start and end times of events to determine busy times. We create new events when an appointment is booked through one of your links.
privacy_li_tokens: Tokens: We securely store the OAuth 2.0 tokens (access token and refresh token) provided by Google to access your calendar on your behalf, without you having to log in repeatedly.
privacy_p_data_usage: We use the collected information exclusively for the following purposes:
privacy_li_core_services: To provide the core services of the application: calculating your availability and scheduling appointments in your calendar.
privacy_li_account_management: To manage and authenticate your account.
privacy_li_communication: To facilitate communication between you and the person booking an appointment.
privacy_p_data_sharing_1: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy_p_data_sharing_2: Your information is only shared in the following context:
privacy_li_booking_context: When an appointment is booked, the event title and selected time are shared with the person making the appointment, via a calendar invitation.
privacy_p_data_security: We take the security of your data seriously. Access tokens are stored encrypted, and we apply reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.
privacy_p_your_rights: You can revoke our application's access to your Google account at any time via your Google account's security settings. If you revoke access, we will delete your data from our systems.
privacy_p_contact: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at jan@pvmonteur.nl.
dashboard_calendars_empty: No appointments have been made yet to show a leaderboard.
appointments_empty: No appointments have been scheduled for this selection yet.
confirm_delete_appointment: Are you sure you want to delete this appointment? This cannot be undone.
home_page_title: Agenda Share - Smart scheduling, including travel time
home_hero_subtitle: The smartest way to your next appointment. Agenda Share finds the perfect time for you and your client, including travel time. No more back-and-forth emails.
home_howitworks_title: How it works in 3 simple steps
home_howitworks_subtitle: You'll be ready to intelligently share your calendar in just a few minutes.
home_howitworks_step1_text: Works seamlessly with your existing Google Calendar. No new calendar, no hassle.
home_howitworks_step2_text: Define your working hours, appointment duration, and buffer time. You are in control.
home_howitworks_step3_text: Your clients book a suitable time themselves based on your current availability and their location.
home_feature_title: Say goodbye to travel time stress.
home_feature_text: Our unique engine automatically calculates the travel time between your appointments. This way you optimize your route, avoid gaps in your schedule, and win back valuable time.
home_growth_text: Start for free today and discover how you can automate your planning. We will soon be expanding with powerful features for teams and advanced reporting.
confirm_delete_link: Are you sure you want to delete this link? This cannot be undone.
confirmation_marketing_title: Want to schedule this effortlessly too?
confirmation_marketing_subtitle: This appointment was scheduled with Agenda Share, the smart scheduling tool for service professionals.
confirmation_marketing_feature1: Save hours every week: No more emailing or calling for an appointment.
confirmation_marketing_feature2: Optimize your travel time: Earn money on the road, instead of losing it.
confirmation_marketing_feature3: Give your clients a flawless experience, just like this one.
confirmation_marketing_cta: Discover Agenda Share for your business - Try for free
no_slots_available: There are no available days in this period.
no_slots_available_on_day: No available times on this day.
appointments_empty_subtitle: When an appointment is booked through one of your links, it will appear here.
certainty_green: Travel time has been calculated. This time slot is confirmed.
certainty_blue: Ample margin (>1 hour) until the next appointment.
certainty_yellow: Limited margin (30-60 min) until the next appointment.
certainty_red: Little margin (<30 min) until the next appointment.
error_verify_slot: Verification of the time slot failed.
booking_warning_red: Warning: Travel time could not be calculated. There is a high risk this time slot will not fit. You can proceed, but the appointment may be canceled later.
booking_warning_yellow: Warning: Travel time could not be calculated. There is an increased risk this time slot will not fit. You can proceed, but the appointment may be canceled later.
booking_warning_blue: Warning: Travel time could not be calculated, but there appears to be sufficient margin. You can proceed, but the appointment may be canceled later.
rate_limit_message: Too many requests. Please try again in
error_session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
Your session has expired. Please log in again.
